page.title: 01COLSTERWORTH VILLAGE CHURCH
page.content: The Rector of Colsterworth is also Rector of Skillington, Great and Little Ponton and Stoke Rochford. Services. - Holy Communion on Sunday mornings at 8.30, or 9.30, or 10.15 and at 8. a.m. one Sunday per month. Evensong at 6.30 p.m. on 3 Sundays per month. Attendance - Holy Communion average of 10 to 40 persons. Collection between Â£10 and Â£40. Evensong average of 8 to 14 persons. Collection average Â£4 to Â£15. The Rector is paid Â£600 by the church and his stipend is made up by the Church Commissioners. There is a small choir in attendance at Holy Communion but not at Evensong.
